channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
Ok i have been trying to make a server for a while. The following thing is what happens when i run pimpscape:
"You need to have java files for this compiler to compile. press any key to continue . . .[br][size=1]Posted on: April 22, 2007, 06:21:51 PM[/size][hr]Someone please help and also if someone could help me all the way throught my server, i will make them admin and pay them 1mil gp

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @GoldenShard GoldenShard
item.description:
@GoldenShard wrote:

In either a folder that says Java or Class. I recommend actually checking all the folders you have and removing everything in them and putting them with your compile.bat and runserver.bat folder remove all the contents of all folders except for the ./config/ I hope that’s not to complicated it’s quite hard to explain.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @paintplaye paintplaye
item.description:
@paintplaye wrote:

where can i find if i have the folder?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @GoldenShard GoldenShard
item.description:
@GoldenShard wrote:

Well this is quite simple, your Java files are either in a folder or you don’t have them at all.

  1. If they’re in a folder it may be labled “Java” or something similar take all the Java files and the Class files out and put them in the place that has runserver.bat in it.

  2. If you don’t see a folder with Java or Class files then I recommend using a different source. Because the one you have is just plain out dull. Good luck.

Read full topic
